resources.string: Here should be a list of recently played songs, it should be done using ArrayList Class.

Here on top should be a horizontal LinearLayout with some suggested playlists. Below this layout should be a vertical ArrayList with playlists like \"Top charts\", \"New Music\", \"Genres\", \"Music Videos\".
Here on top should be a search engine (SearchView). Below should be vertical ArrayList with \"Recent searches\" and below this should be ArrayList with \"Trending searches\".
Here should be vertical ArrayList with our playlists. On top should be a working button to create new playlist. There should be used a listener to open a playlist when we click one.
Here should be vertical ArrayList with our favorite songs or our playlist songs. We can click on a song to play it. There should be used MediaPlayer class and listener.

Here should be a cover photo of actual playing song, artist and song name. There should be a SeekBar with our song length. There should be a SeekBar with volume. And also there should be buttons to control (change song, pause, play, rewind) the music using MediaPlayer class.
